title: Watch FKA twigs’ Video for New Song “Perfectly”
description: The Jordan Hemingway–directed clip stars twigs and her Eusexua community, dancing freely in a white room

text: The Jordan Hemingway–directed clip stars twigs and her Eusexua community, dancing freely in a white roomFKA twigs has shared a new single following the January release of her latest LP, Eusexua. The new song, titled “Perfectly,” arrives with a music video directed by frequent twigs collaborator Jordan Hemingway. The clip stars twigs and her Eusexua community, dancing freely in a white studio. Check it out below.FKA twigs has shared a number of visuals in connection with Eusexua. So far, she’s shared videos for the title track, “Perfect Stranger,” “Drums of Death,” and “Childlike Things.” The latter video starred director Kevin Smith and was penned by playwright Jeremy O. Harris.Revisit “Hard Beats, Bondage, and Body Paint: What Went Down at FKA twigs’ New York Eusexua Rave.”Madison Bloom is a Washington-born, New York–based writer who covers music and culture. html:
The Jordan Hemingway–directed clip stars twigs and her Eusexua community, dancing freely in a white room

FKA twigs has shared a new single following the January release of her latest LP, Eusexua. The new song, titled “Perfectly,” arrives with a music video directed by frequent twigs collaborator Jordan Hemingway. The clip stars twigs and her Eusexua community, dancing freely in a white studio. Check it out below.

FKA twigs has shared a number of visuals in connection with Eusexua. So far, she’s shared videos for the title track, “Perfect Stranger,” “Drums of Death,” and “Childlike Things.” The latter video starred director Kevin Smith and was penned by playwright Jeremy O. Harris.

Revisit “Hard Beats, Bondage, and Body Paint: What Went Down at FKA twigs’ New York Eusexua Rave.”

Madison Bloom is a Washington-born, New York–based writer who covers music and culture. Her work has appeared in Playboy, No Depression, and Paste. She joined Pitchfork in 2017. ... Read More
